title: Why are ADCS entitled to everything on the map
body: I've never experienced this mentality with any other role. Its ALWAYS the ADC who wants blue buff, red buff, large wave farm on all lanes, kills that don't even belong to them, last hit on everything, peel from everything, praise for everything

Because it's stronger on the adc then it is on who you're playing. Assuming equal skill and performance between players, red buff is better on the adc then on you. ADC scales better with gold then you do, thus the priority for CS and kills. ADC wave-clears more efficiently then you, can siege towers more safely then you and can kill DPS objectives faster then you. 

If it bothers you so much, play adc. League is not an egalitarian utopia.

Because in optimal play, The ADC needs the most gold to be useful to the team, everyone else needs levels more than gold. Random scrubs who only mimic pro play without understanding why it works and why it will never work for them and how it differs from solo queue demand you play under optimal play standards.

Blue Buff: Unless it's an ADC who relies heavily on spells (Ezreal, Corki) or an ADC with a strained mana pool (Sivir, Draven) they should not take blue.

Red Buff: ADC's need to kite. An on-hit slow helps  with that. Unless somebody else is going to be more active on the map (or they simply need the immediate regen) it should go to the ADC.

Farm/Kills: An ADC is a carry. Carries scale the best with gold out of any role, so your ADC has farm priority unless you've got an Azir, Yi, Fiora, or something like that.

Peel: Duh, they're your carry. If your carry dies first, you're probably gonna lose the teamfight.

Praise: It feels good to be noticed. You should praise your team when they do well. This is not exclusive to your ADC.
